cab.content: CONFIDENT! AT...C,F. 4116. C A B.!I N E. T.LEAGUE. Qg NATIONS. "B" IJAI^DATIjS'. Note hy ^^Sog^^taryj;The Counoll of the league of Nations at its sitting yesterday afternoon at St. Jamasrs Palace definitely approved the terms of all the "B" Mandates, i.e.(a) Those to His Majesty^ Government for part of East Afrioa, part of Togoland and the Cameroons;(d) Those to Ftanoe for part of Togoland and the Camesoons;(6) That to Belgium for part of East Afrioa.(Signed). M.P.A. EANKEY.Secretary, Cabinet,Whitehall Gardens, SJ7.1. 21st July, 192^.
